TopicTitle: Game crashes when hovering over certain UI elements

Articles.Content:
KSP version 1.1.3 1260 

32 bit and 64 bit 

Mods : KSP Interstellar Extended 

           Kerbal Engineer

 

First I noticed my game would freeze for a second everytime I hovered over the character portrait. If I held the mouse there my screen would flash a couple of times then it would crash the game. So I decided to play trying hard not to place my mouse over the portrait. Now not only hovering over the portrait will crash my game but also when I hover over the altimeter, as soon as it moves down to show the recover vessel or space center buttons, the game will freeze and if I keep doing it eventually it will crash.
